description:
Have your bike looking shiny and clean before your next ride. This 3-piece set is soft on your bike's finish while being hard on dirt and grime.

  • Soft wash brush for your frame and components
  • Claw brush cleans gears and drivetrain
  • Tapered detail brush gets in those hard-to-reach places
name: Muc-Off 3-Piece Brush Set
